bordered.description: Whether to display outer borders and column borders
bordered.description_zh: 是否展示外边框和列边框

childrenColumnName.description: Specify the column names for the tree structure

:columns.description: For the configuration description of the table columns, see [the following table] (#column)
:columns.description_zh: 表格列的配置描述，具体项见[下表](#column)

:components.description_zh: 覆盖默认的 table 元素

:customFilterDropdown.description: Custom filter menu, you need to use it with 'column.customFilterDropdown'
:customFilterDropdown.description_zh: 自定义筛选菜单，需要配合 `column.customFilterDropdown` 使用

defaultExpandAllRows.description: Initially, whether to expand all rows
defaultExpandAllRows.description_zh: 初始时，是否展开所有行

emptyText.description: Customize what is displayed when empty data is displayed
emptyText.description_zh: 自定义空数据时的显示内容

expandedRowRender.type: Function(record, index, indent, expanded):VNode | v-slot:expandedRowRender="{record, index, indent, expanded}"

expandFixed.description: To control whether the expansion icon is fixed, you can select true 'left' right
expandFixed.description_zh: 控制展开图标是否固定，可选 true `left` right

expandRowByClick.description: Expand the sub-rows by clicking on the rows
expandRowByClick.description_zh: 通过点击行来展开子行

:getPopupContainer.description: Set the rendering nodes for various types of floating layers in the table, such as the filter menu
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 设置表格内各类浮层的渲染节点，如筛选菜单

:indentSize.description: The width of each layer indentation, in px, when displaying tree data
:indentSize.description_zh: 展示树形数据时，每层缩进的宽度，以 px 为单位

locale.description: The default copywriting settings currently include sorting, filtering, and empty data copy
locale.description_zh: 默认文案设置，目前包括排序、过滤、空数据文案

:pagination.description: Paginer, refer to the [Config] (#pagination) or [pagination](/components/pagination-cn/) document, and do not display and pagination when set to false
:pagination.description_zh: 分页器，参考[配置项](#pagination)或 [pagination](/components/pagination-cn/)文档，设为 false 时不展示和进行分页

:rowClassName.description: The class name of the table row

:rowExpandable.description: Set whether to allow row expansion

rowKey.description: The value of the table row key can be a string or a function
rowKey.description_zh: 表格行 key 的取值，可以是字符串或一个函数

:rowSelection.description: Whether the list item is selectable, [configuration item] (#rowselection)
:rowSelection.description_zh: 列表项是否可选择，[配置项](#rowselection)

:scroll.description: Whether the table can be scrolled, or you can specify the width and height of the scrolling area, [Configuration Item] (#scroll)
:scroll.description_zh: 表格是否可滚动，也可以指定滚动区域的宽、高，[配置项](#scroll)

showExpandColumn.description: Set whether to display rows to expand columns
showExpandColumn.description_zh: 设置是否展示行展开列

:showSorterTooltip.description: Whether the header displays a tooltip hint for the next sort. When the parameter type is Object, it will be set as a property of the Tooltip
:showSorterTooltip.description_zh: 表头是否显示下一次排序的 tooltip 提示。当参数类型为对象时，将被设置为 Tooltip 的属性

:sortDirections.description: The supported sorting method can be 'ascend' descend
:sortDirections.description_zh: 支持的排序方式，取值为 `ascend` descend

:sticky.description: Set the sticky head and scrollbar
:sticky.type: boolean | `{offsetHeader?: number, offsetScroll?: number, getContainer?: () => HTMLElement}`
:sticky.description_zh: 设置粘性头部和滚动条

tableLayout.description: The [table-layout](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/table-layout) property of the table element, set to 'fixed' means that the content does not affect the layout of the column
tableLayout.default: 无<hr | >固定表头 | 列或使用了 `column.ellipsis` 时，默认值为 fixed
tableLayout.description_zh: 表格元素的 [table-layout](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/CSS/table-layout) 属性，设为 `fixed` 表示内容不会影响列的布局

:transformCellText.description: The default configuration for empty data can be changed again before the data is rendered, and can be configured globally through [ConfigProvider](/components/config-provider-cn/).
:transformCellText.type: Function({ text, column, record, index }) => any，此处的 text 是经过其它定义单元格 api 处理后的数据，有可能是 VNode | string | number 类型
:transformCellText.description_zh: 数据渲染前可以再次改变，一般用于空数据的默认配置，可以通过 [ConfigProvider](/components/config-provider-cn/) 全局统一配置

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when there are changes in pagination, sorting, and filtering
events.description_zh: 分页、排序、筛选变化时触发

events.name: expand
events.description: Triggered when the expand icon is clicked

events.name: expandedRowsChange
events.description: Triggered when the expanded row changes

events.name: resizeColumn
events.description: Triggered when a column is dragged
